CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Follow Account stage positioned above or below the Content Creation or Upload stage?
SRP.A: The Follow Account stage is positioned {above} the Content Creation or Upload stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {logarithmic} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Follow Account?
VE.A: The value of stage Follow Account is {55}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Like or Comment?
VE.A: The value of stage Like or Comment is {143}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Like or Comment, with a value of {143}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Participate in Paid Subscription, with a value of {24}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Content Creation or Upload to stage Participate in Paid Subscription?
SC.A: Decreased by {6} Million Users from stage Content Creation or Upload to stage Participate in Paid Subscription.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 115? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 43? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Join Group or Community} stage has {32}, the {Content Creation or Upload} stage has {30}, the {Participate in Paid Subscription} stage has {24}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 31 and 71? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Follow Account} stage has {55}, the {Join Group or Community} stage has {32}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Content Creation or Upload to Participate in Paid Subscription, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Content Creation or Upload} to {Participate in Paid Subscription} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Follow Account to Join Group or Community, from stage Share Content to Follow Account, or from stage Join Group or Community to Content Creation or Upload?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Share Content} to stage {Follow Account} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Like or Comment} and {Share Content} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Join Group or Community} and {Content Creation or Upload} stages.
